03_People.recommendation: Use character names as filenames, add 'npc' tag in frontmatter
03_People.example: NPC00407_Hestara_Dawnstrider.md → Hestara Dawnstrider.md with tags: [npc, warrior, ally]

01_Adventures.recommendation: Use descriptive quest names, add quest type/status in tags
01_Adventures.example: QUEST00108_Main_Quest_109.md → The Void Conspiracy.md with tags: [quest, main-quest, active]

01_Adventures.recommendation: Merge duplicate content or use version control

02_Worldbuilding.description: 261 files appear to be NPCs in Worldbuilding
02_Worldbuilding.recommendation: Move character files to 03_People, keep only location/lore here

05_Rules.recommendation: Use spell name only, add source in tags/frontmatter
05_Rules.example: Acid Splash Xphb.md → Acid Splash.md with tags: [spell, cantrip, xphb]

CRITICAL.reason: Prefixes prevent natural wiki-linking and search
CRITICAL.solution: Rename to character names, use tags for categorization

HIGH.reason: Numeric prefixes make quests hard to reference
HIGH.solution: Use descriptive names, track quest IDs in frontmatter

MEDIUM.reason: Characters mixed with locations breaks organization
MEDIUM.solution: Separate people from places for better navigation
